掛.definition: to hang; to suspend (from a hook etc); to hang up (the phone); (of a line) to be dead; to be worried; to be concerned; (dialect) to make a phone call; to register (at a hospital); to make an appointment (with a doctor); (slang) to kill; to die; to be finished; to fail (an exam); classifier for sets or clusters of objects

掛一漏萬.definition: to mention some but omit many others (idiom); to leave out much more than one includes

掛住.definition: to get caught (entangled); to catch (on sth)

掛名.definition: to attach sb's name to (a role); to go by the title of; nominal; in name only

掛在嘴上.definition: to pay lip service to; to keep mentioning (without doing anything); to blather on about sth

掛在嘴邊.definition: to keep saying (sth) over and over

掛失.definition: to report the loss of something

掛好.definition: to hang up properly (telephone, picture, clothes etc)

掛帥.definition: to be in command; (fig.) to dominate over other considerations; to be over-emphasized

掛彩.definition: to decorate for festive occasions; to be wounded in action

掛心.definition: to worry; to be on one's mind

掛念.definition: to feel anxious about; to have (sth) weighing on one's mind

掛急診.definition: to register as an emergency case at a hospital

掛懷.definition: concerned; troubled; having sth on one's mind

掛搭.definition: variant of 掛褡|挂褡[gua4 da1]

掛擋.definition: to put into gear; to engage the gear; gear change

掛旗.definition: vertical banner (for display at exhibitions, advertising hung from poles in the street etc)

掛機.definition: to hang up (a phone); to leave a computer etc running (idling, downloading, or playing a game in one's stead etc)

掛水.definition: to put sb on an intravenous drip

掛牌.definition: lit. to hang up a plate; to open up for business; listed (on stock market)

掛空擋.definition: see 放空擋|放空挡[fang4 kong1dang3]

掛羊頭賣狗肉.pinyin: guà yáng tóu mài gǒu ròu
掛羊頭賣狗肉.definition: lit. to hang a sheep's head while selling dog meat (idiom); fig. to cheat; dishonest advertising; wicked deeds carried out under banner of virtue

掛職.definition: temporary assignment to a Chinese government or CCP post

掛花.definition: to be wounded; (of plants) to bloom

掛號.definition: to register (at a hospital etc); to send by registered mail

掛褡.definition: (of a monk) to take residence at a temple

掛起.definition: to hang up (a picture etc); to hoist up (a flag); (computing) to suspend (a process); (of a system) to hang; pending (operation)

掛鉤.definition: to couple; to link; to hook together; (fig.) (preceded by 與|与[yu3] + {entity}) to establish contact (with {entity}); (Tw) to collude (with {entity}); (fig.) to link (marketing efforts with production etc); to peg (welfare payments to inflation etc); to tie (remuneration to performance etc); hook (on which to hang sth); latch hook; coupling

掛鉤兒.definition: erhua variant of 掛鉤|挂钩[gua4 gou1]

掛靠.definition: to be affiliated with; to operate under the wing of; affiliation

掛靴.definition: (sports) to hang up one's boots; to retire

掛馬.definition: Trojan horse, to add malware to a website or program (computing)
